com.compendium.ui.edits
Class ClipboardTransferables

java.lang.Object
  com.compendium.ui.edits.ClipboardTransferables
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.datatransfer.Transferable
public class ClipboardTransferables
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.datatransfer.Transferable

Transferable class for the Clipboard. This class handles multiple node/link transfers for later undo/redo edits operations.

          A List of object required for the edit.

Specified by:

getTransferData

public java.lang.Object getTransferData(java.awt.datatransfer.DataFlavor data)
Returns an object which represents the data to be transferred. The class of the object returned is defined by the representation class of the flavor.

Specified by:
getTransferData in interface java.awt.datatransfer.Transferable
Parameters:

Returns:
Object, returns this object.
